actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to expedite construction starts on certain approved public works projects, and to eliminate certain procedural requirements in order to reduce delays and accelerate certain public works programs and projects in the nature of flood control.

summary.text: Emergency Flood Control Acceleration Act - Directs the head of each department of the Federal Government having jurisdiction over any program or project carried out under the authority of either the Rivers and Harbors Acts or the Flood Control Acts, to reduce or eliminate procedural requirements established in such laws in order to speed up the initiation or completion of such projects. States that nothing in this Act authorizes the elimination of National Environmental Policy Act requirements.

titles.title: A bill to expedite construction starts on certain approved public works projects, and to eliminate certain procedural requirements in order to reduce delays and accelerate certain public works programs and projects in the nature of flood control.
